short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your ChatGPT conversations into flashcards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üòù The problem - Flashcards and spaced repetition make remembering easy, but preparing flashcards is sooo boring and lengthy. High quality ones, in particular, are sooo time consuming.

‚úÖ That's what CardsGPT is for. A tool for the ones out there that want to focus on learning. Chat with ChatGPT, unleash your curiosity, and then press a button to let us generate for you a new deck of flashcards to review the main concepts you learnt at a later time. ü§ì
